mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM training_course_application a JOIN dog d ON a.dog_id = d.dog_id WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} AND a.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY a.applied_at DESC
SELECT * FROM training_course_application WHERE application_id = #{applicationId} AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO training_course_application ( session_id, dog_id, applied_at, status, reject_reason, created_by, created_at, updated_by, updated_at, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{sessionId}, #{dogId}, #{appliedAt}, #{status}, #{rejectReason}, 1, #{appliedAt}, 1, #{appliedAt}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE training_course_application SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE application_id = #{applicationId}
